title: Unlock/Open Doors
description: Easily create dynamic, interactive doors that can be opened and unlocked with just a few clicks. Includes useful features that will make your game much more immersive and feel a lot more interactable. Perfect for Horror games.
longDescription:
[Trailer] [Documentation] [Discord]


Quickly and easily set up doors that can be opened and unlocked through a variety of triggers and conditions.

Unlock Doors blueprint is designed to be user-friendly, allowing you to customize a wide range of features to suit your needs. For example, you can add your own voice acting and sound effects to enhance the immersive experience of your project. You can also set up text pop-ups that provide additional information or guidance to the player, making it easier to navigate your interactive space.


One of the key benefits of Unlock Doors is that it's incredibly easy to edit and implement, even for those without extensive programming knowledge. You can quickly and easily adjust the behavior and appearance of your doors, as well as modify the triggers and conditions for opening and unlocking them. This means you can create interactive experiences that are tailored to your specific needs and goals, without having to worry about the technical details.


Unlock Doors is a powerful and flexible tool that can help you create immersive and interactive experiences that engage your audience and enhance the overall quality of your project. With its voice acting, text pop-ups, opening and unlocking functionality, and ease of editing and implementation, this blueprint is the perfect solution for anyone looking to create dynamic, interactive doors that add an extra layer of immersion to their project.
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  •  Unlock and open doors
  •  Addable key types for different doors
  •  Voice acting and interactive features
  • Dialogue system for picking up and interacting
  • Knock on doors
  • Easily add an infinite number of key and door types
  • Immersive sounds and animations
  • Easy to edit and use
  • Documented
  • Includes custom font!

Number of Blueprints: 2

Input: Keyboard and Mouse

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: No

Documentation: https://docs.google.com/document/d/11aay89o8ZJE8LfLpFikIpL_GcN_ysGK77BDWa1rI-Zg/edit?usp=sharing

Important/Additional Notes: While easy to use and edit, adding custom doors and key models will take a little extra work. Refer to documentation! ^
